title: My First Blog!
text:
Hi, this is a blog :)


Semesters really do fly by. I wrote my first Psych 391 (Advanced Data Analysis) test on Wednesday, and I hope I did well. I also started to feel unwell that day, but luckily I was able to pull through. I can’t say the same though for the weekends, as at the time of writing this, hoooboy I am ridden with coughs and sniffles and a sore body. It hasn’t really been a super duper fun week because of the sickness, but oh well. Looking forward to next week! (2 tests :’c)

title: Linus Ma
text:
About
I am a 4th Year Psychology and Theatre & Performance Student attending the University of Waterloo. I have had the privelege to learn from many professors and mentors in both disciplines, expanding my knowledge in my passions.

title: Linus Ma
text:
Interests

Psychology
I am heavily interested in clinical and counselling psychology, specifically in assisting families, teenageres, and young adults through hard times.


Not Psychology
I also have a separate plan that doesn’t include psychology! It follows my other passion (and major), theatre and specifically, acting. This passion really came to fruition at the end of my high school years when I discovered how much joy being on stage and taking on characters could make me feel. Ever since then, I have had been incredibly fortunate to have been able to work and learn from amazing casts, directors, and mentors.
As an actor, you can expect me to always give 100% and commit to any production or role I am given.

title: Linus Ma
text:
Contact
You can contact me at my email: ma.lylinus@gmail.com
You can also check me out on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/linus-ma-950b3b2b1/
